Posts.Content: Hi You poor love I suffered like you after first cycle TCHP.  So they dose reduced by 10% the doxetaxol and carboplatin for cycle2 but I also got my GP prescribe a mouthwash called CAPHOSOL which you can use up to 10 times a day. It's brilliant. Also use Biotene toothpaste every 2 hours.  Food wise it's tragic unfortunately. All your favourite things taste weird and burn. I have tried to avoid dairy products because they make chances of thrush increase and made me feel more sick. Try tinned peachs and pineapple in natural juice. I just have a tin constantly open with a fork and eat them often. For savoury stuff you need the salty stuff and have rediscovered my love for quavers and wotsits!!  It will be ok... hope this helps.. Xxxxx
Posts.Title: Oh my mouth...

Posts.Content: Hi I am close enough and was exactly where you are 12 months ago. I would love to meet up as I work In Stockport I will private message you my number if I can find out how to do that! Lol  Loads of love Xxxx
Posts.Title: ANY BC LADIES IN STOCKKORT?

Posts.Content: Just after cycle 3 of TCHP I had awful palpitations and couldn't even get out of bed. Looked like my HB was in my boots. When for pre cycle 4 review and did bloods HB low but had obviously had a week to recover and ecg done which was abnormal showing some sort of "event" t waves inverted. At this point I was terrified. They sent me for a. Echo which came back completely normal. Deferred the next cycle fir a week to let my HB recover more. But I still find my heart pounding in slight exertion and feel scared of this whole situation! Any one else had this? Xxx
Posts.Title: Palpitations with an abnormal ecg 3 weeks after TCHP cycle 3.. help...

Posts.Content: Yes you should! I have had loads of checks and they are happy to say it really isn't fluid retention or my heart. Still get them and feel like a lump! They want my GP to do bloods for thyroid function and hormones so will get that checked. I just want to be normal again!  What ever normal is.. can't remember.. get it checked though because anxiety can cause them too.  Xxxx
Posts.Title: Palpitations with an abnormal ecg 3 weeks after TCHP cycle 3.. help...

Posts.Content: Hi don't be scared girl. Xx  I had all that this year. After my 3rd cycle I couldn't find the lump and neither could anyone after my MRI. The treatment is VERY successful. I have had surgery and rads and having just the Herceptin until January. I am back st work and have a mass of curly hair! It is tough but worth it as it's so successful. Where are you having treatment? Private message if you want I chat and I will give you my number. Masses of love to you.  Xxxxxxxx Bev
Posts.Title: P-TCH chemo before surgery

Posts.Content: not sure if it is related but the government have standard RTT = referral to treatment Times. Certain conditions have different pathways. I have started my treatment plan 3 weeks after my core result. Bit of a whirlwind to be honest... but very grateful. Xx
Posts.Title: Neoadjuvant chemo

Posts.Content: Hi lovely warriors I finished TCHP in April. Continuing Herceptin which I have had 4 of. My legs a feet are so painful. I struggle to get moving with the pain in my feet and st night my legs and feet burn and drive me nuts. My hands are also getting worse. I am told this is not Herceptin but as I am now 3 months after the carboplatin and doxetaxol why is this getting worse?? It's awful. I also feel knackered and dizzy after the Herceptin which is worse each time? Can't imagine how much worse this is going to get if I have another 10 Herceptin!! The team seem to dismiss this. I am back at work part time and struggling. Still have to have rads in a few weeks. So sorry to moan!  Hugs and love. Xxxx
Posts.Title: Neuropathy getting worse

Posts.Content: Hi... Just had my 3rd cycle of doxetaxol and herceptin but also having carboplatin and pertruzamub too. Or oknwn as TCHP. It's a rough tough combo. The first one was really rough as I didn't know what to expect but here is some advice which may help: The first doses is always a loading dose so next one should be lower. You need to have anti sickness tablets and you need to take them. 2 days of zofran then regular metroclopramide. The mouth is a big problem I brush my teeth every 2 hours with biotene toothpaste ( get it from boots) when you have your next dose chew ice cubes constantly through the doxetaxol infusion this made a massive improvement after wards also get your GP to prescribe a mouthwash called caphasol which is brilliant ( it is expensive but your GP should do it if not you can buy it on line) Your feet and hands will get sore and "prickly" try wearing cotton socks and gloves with loads of moisturising cream massaged in first.  I take regular pain killers for the aches and pains from the GCSF injections which are your saviour in terms of getting your white cell count back up quickly. As far as eating... I lived on jelly and I kept a big containers of cut up fruit. Best ones are melon pineapple black grapes. I avoided dairy foods because I felt they made my throats lol clogged up and added to the nausea. I rediscovered quavers! Try and drink as much as you can. Your taste will come back by about week 3 but not completely. Make a diary of each day and then take it with you to your next appointment. The hospital and team are there to make this journey as easy as they can do you can get the treatment you need.  Good luck... anything else I can help with please let me know. I am only half way through and to be honest I am fed up of feeling like a sack of spuds but know it's not forever and have 3 more to go but at least I can not find my nasty little HER2+++ lump anymore!  Loads of love ❤️ xxx
Posts.Title: Docetaxel & Herceptin side affects

Posts.Content: Hi lovely girl. I had worked and assisted with core biopsies on breast clinics for years and always thought I couldn't cope with having one. I was a mess when they said they needed to do one on my lump. They give you a local anaesthetic with a little needle first and you feel a tiny sting for a second or two. Then apart from the clicking noise of the biopsy sampler you really won't feel a thing. Get someone holding your hand and chatting to distract you. There are loads of people out there who will tell you a load of shit but on here you will have fabulous brave strong people who will tell you the truth and support you all the way. Xxxxx
Posts.Title: 22yo terrified of core biopsy - and, well, everything

Posts.Content: Hi. The weird nose sores and crusts. Yep me too. I finished TCHP in April but still on the Herceptin. It's awful. I ordered something called Happinose on amazon and it's pretty good. It's a toss up between a sore crusty nose or a slimy greasy runny nose! Ha ha. My heart goes out to you. Xxxx
Posts.Title: Nose sores!!

Posts.Content: Hi my lovely ladies... I am day 5 after first TCHP..I have not slept at all feel like I have the worse sore throat and feeling of sickness and aching.  GP gave me difflam and nystatin yesterday but worse now. It's like a really bad flu... wonder if it's those injections I have been having for my WCC? Xxx
Posts.Title: Can't bear this sore throat..

Posts.Content: Thanks baki, My tongue and mouth lining continue to give me trouble. Got some caphsol mouth washes. Just riding the storm. My breast lump has almost disappeared after my first cycle of TCHP. Must be a dream! Xxxx
Posts.Title: Can't bear this sore throat..

Posts.Content: Thank you Megan. I have started on lanzaprozole to reduce my stomach acid as they feel the reflux is making my throat worse. Feeling very achy today after my 6th Filgrastim may not have the 7th as this aching is crap and I was feeling better and almost human today! Lol.  Xxxxx
Posts.Title: Can't bear this sore throat..

Posts.Content: Thanks lynn My temp is ok. I spoke to the hotline and they said I need to let my onc know before next cycle because I won't be able to get through next one if it's going to be thus bad. And I need to.. xxxx
Posts.Title: Can't bear this sore throat..

Posts.Content: Hi  I am fed up of my side effects being dismissed and told it is still the docetaxol and carbo after 4 months. I feel weirdly spaced out and dizzy frequently throughout the day. Its like I think i am going to fall over.  My body aches, I can't sleep, my nose gets so sore and crusty. This seems to get worse end of week 2 and into week 3 prior to my next herceptin dose. The dizziness and weird head stuff is the hardest part to cope with it scares me. any advice from anyone? I think I am going mad! xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Herceptin side effects help

Posts.Content: Hi, I am struggling with my weight post chemo. I know it's also down to the menopausal status and Herceptin but a friend has lost weight using green coffee beans and am unsure if I can take these? They are high in antioxidant, have caffeine and something called chlorogenic acid.  Any thoughts? Love and hugs Xxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Green coffee extract

Posts.Content: Thank you all. I am trying to move more but at this stage I get so light headed and dizzy when I go out walking the dog even though I drink loads of water and eat healthy. My body seems to be a bit of a mess right now but truly grateful it's cancer free!  Love and hugs  I shall drink the coffee! Lol and stay away from the fad stuff. Xx
Posts.Title: Green coffee extract

Posts.Content: Day 4 so weird still feel nauseous but ok not been sick but god my throat and mouth are sore and I feel like I have a head cold. Temp is fine. Can I take multi vitamins? Feel like a slug!! Xx
Posts.Title: New to this update

Posts.Content: Giving it a go. Xx thank you xxx
Posts.Title: New to this update

Posts.Content: Well lovelies had my first TCHP session yesterday. Nearly didn't make it through the doors into the chemo suite even though the steroids had be buzzing about before hand. But I did it. Was a long day of nothing! Easy cannulation. Drank 3 litres and lunch and dinner reflexology and foot massage. Day 2 at home my guts feel ready to explode but keeping at bay by zofran and dexa. Tired but think that's lack of sleep. Plastered nails with aquaphor... and have started watching homeland to keep the focus off "this is obviously the calm before the storm" xxxx love to you all...
Posts.Title: New to this update

Posts.Content: Hi... I was diagnosed with HER2+++ ER+ In January. I was scared to death. But here I am in September. I had chemo with Herceptin and pertruzamub from January to April. After my 3rd cycle I couldn't find my lump! Nor could the ONC. So I had an MRI scan and they couldn't find the cancer. I still had more chemo then I had a lumpectomy and nodes removed. I had a complete pathological response to the amazing drugs. I have had radiotherapy since then just to be sure and am having Herceptin for another 6 months. This is the treatment regime most places seem to use with great success. They will check your heart and monitor you as there is a very slight possibility of heart damage with Herceptin but it is a very low risk and with all other things considered it's worth the risk. Honestly the worse bit is the waiting and the Doctor googling is terrifying! I made myself ill staying up all night reading stuff until I started the treatment. The nurses and doctors are amazing and the line of treatment although long and a bit scary is the best you can get! You will get through it and the support on here is awesome!  Lots of virtual hugs and love  Bev Xxxx
Posts.Title: ER+ and HER2+

Posts.Content: Hi Not sure if this helps but I had TCHP x 4. Was due 6 but I struggled with Dox Side effects. The P was pertruzamub which had to be given with doxetaxol and carboplatin. This was pre surgery.  After 3 they scanned me and my cancer could not be found. Don't worry because if your ONC is happy to stop doxetaxol then accept it. They obviously think it's ok to stop or they wouldn't. The most important one is Herceptin if you are a HER2 xxxx  Love and hugs
Posts.Title: Stopping Docetaxel

Posts.Content: Hi, so I am once again awake..wide awake I start TCHP for my hER2+++ ER minimal and no nodes Chemo on friday, I am having awful panic attacks and terrors every time I think about Friday. I am terrified of the side effects and how I will be as I cant quite get my head round the fact that I am going to be made ill when I don't feel ill! Can I have anti anxiety medication with the chemo or I don't think I will get through this..... I am usually the strongest most together person, with a senior manager position in the NHS but right now I am so fed up with myself and the way I feel... xxx
Posts.Title: so scared new to this

Posts.Content: Thanks Julia. I am sure that once I get the first one over with and I have been told that the team do everything they can to help you through it. Hugs Bev xxx

Then as I am sure my heart is well and truly functioning I shall go in for cycle 1... Much love Bev xxxxxxxx

Think I will definitely be asking for some calm me down stuff!! also I believe I will have dexamethasone before friday so whoopie do I believe that will keep me awake too...so will head into my first chemo wired like a spring and not had any sleep! Much love and thanks Bev xxx

Posts.Content: Hi everyone Anyone else have shocking nostril dryness it's mighty painful and feels crusty. Apologies for that as it implies I have had my finger up there... yep indeed.  Lol xxx

I suppose its about trial and error. I am having very odd food cravings...baked beans and tuna fish with mayo at 3am....like being pregnant.. B xxx
Posts.Title: Sore nose

Posts.Content: Thanks Maggie It's settled this week but I am into week 3 so back for cycle 2 soon. I have listed all my SE s to discuss with my onc.. hopefully he will drop doses of dox and carb to ease off the nasty ones. My fingers and toes are my biggest issue now so cold, painful with numbness and tingling.. I have been trying to plaster them with aquaphor and started knitting ( not with my feet! Lol) and I also feel like a big fat slob already! Xx
Posts.Title: Sore nose

Posts.Content: Hi. I am having carboplatin and pertruzemab with the T and H. But agree with the other ladies. My nails have started to peel and a got neuropathy in fingers and feet from the T. Ask for ice gloves and boots to wear during T that really helps and the mouth  sores etc try chewing ice cubes/chips during the T this saved me from the hideous mucositis I had with first cycle. I am through 3 with 3 to go but delayed as HB low. It will be ok you are half way. Stay strong and stay on here it really helps. Xxxx
Posts.Title: Docetaxel & Heceptin Chemo

Posts.Content: Hi I was excepting that because of the doxetaxel. These SEs are just a bit of a lucky (not) dip! Xxx
Posts.Title: Sore nose

Posts.Content: It's just another SE I didn't know about. I also seem to be 2kgs heavier than 2 weeks ago! There is no chance I have added 2kg of flab in that time. B xxx
